name: Relax embroidered eye pillow
description:
Depending on whether you choose an aromatherapy lavender scented eye pillow or unscented it will still create a gentle soothing touch over the eyes. They are perfect for migraines, stress and insomnia. They are perfect for healing, centering and relaxing. For hot therapy, microwave one. For cold therapy, freeze one. The oversized pillows are wonderful to cover your eyes, without feeling too heavy and can be used in the small of your back or under your neck and head. This pillow is 100% hand crafted in the USA using the very best American grown buckwheat hulls, they are locally grown and harvested, and they have been cleaned using a triple cleaning process to remove dust, buckwheat flour, and debris from amongst the hulls. 100% organic, grown totally without pesticides or herbicides and are considered hypo-allergenic. The pillow measures approx 10 inches long by 5 inches wide and 1 inch deep.

The flax seed only pillow is heavier on the eyes and will rest on your temples, it measures 10" x 4" x 0.8". These custom made high quality pillows may vary in size by 1/8 to 1/4 inch. As for the lavender scents just enough, not overpowering and when it stops to have a suitably strong aroma just knead the pillow and the lavender buds will open up and release more scent.

 

All finest brocade fabrics unless stated otherwise, eg. satin, silk or cotton.

options.name: Buckwheat hulls with flax seed and lavender
Buckwheat hulls with flax seed unscented

name: "Fall" Lumbar Support
description:
JUST UNDER 14 ounces of Organic Buckwheat hulls, inner cotton shell, comes scented or unscented. Reinforced stitching. Made with hand painted, dyed Indonesian Batik, the colors of the batiks will vary slightly, due to the dyeing process, splashes of color on the fabric which makes them unique.

Measures  13.5 " x  5.5" and 2.5 " deep.  14 inch zipper for easily removed and washable cover. Only microwave the inner shell, the cover has a zipper. 

Best to hand wash and air dry the cover.

FOR HEAD/NECK AND LUMBAR SUPPORT

name: Travel/Neck Pillow Dark Brown
description: Travel /neck pillow       $18  Approx  33 to 35"  tip to tip and 4.5" deep & wide, will easily accommodate neck width of 8 inches wide. Weighs at least 1.8 lbs. Made with quality no pill cozy and soft fleece. Great while you are travelling, to rest your baby on while feeding and while you are watching tv or reading. This pillow has no lining and is sewn shut ( NO ZIPPER ).
